EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Marketo Follow-up - Email 3 (How to Automate your Testcases with
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Automate your Testcases with Tosca!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How to Automate your Testcases with Tosca!
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We hope you’re enjoying the trial version of Tosca Testsuite! There are some great tutorials and videos including these videos to help you start automating your test cases:
- How Tosca Testsuite can Scan any html Website <http://vimeo.com/118492030>
- How to Create a TestCase <http://vimeo.com/118572576>
- How to Create and Run an Execution List <http://vimeo.com/118572577>
You can find a more step-by-step approach to creating automated test cases in our Tutorial Guide <https://support.tricentis.com/community/downloads.do?number=DOW0003466>.
Hope you’ve found this helpful!
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricentis.com>
Product and Licensing For further questions regarding product or licensing, please contact our Tricentis sales team: Website <http://innovate.tricentis.com/talk-with-sales.html> | e-mail <mailto:sales@tricentis.com>
Events & Webinars Stay informed with our regular events and webinars which you can find here <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events>!
Support Technical support is available to provide help during the trial period. Please contact the Tricentis support team here: Website <https://support.tricentis.com/community/> | e-mail <mailto:support@tricentis.com>
